name: Wink Murder!
description:
Mr. Yellow has to pay for what he did, and you believe you should take action. Use the power of your eyes to kill those around him and maybe even he himself. (Warning: May include cats)                     CLOSED FOR MAINTENANCE FOR NOW.

Mouse only top-down action game.

Programming   -   @TedScottPilgrim

Art - @SoikryEternelle / SoikryGoogle
